# Controlled Items, Substances & Areas
Controlled Items, Substances and Areas are [bold]items, chemicals or weaponry[/bold] that are resticted from public use.
[textlink="Controlled Items" link="ControlledItems"] are items that is restricted from general possession and use.
[textlink="Controlled Substances" link="ControlledSub"] are [bold]drugs that must be approved by the Chief Medical Officer for dangerous drugs[/bold], or the [bold]Psychologist for drugs that affect mental wellbeing.[/bold]
[textlink="Controlled Araments" link="ControlledArms"] are weapons. [bold]They are classified into categories from A to E based on severity[/bold] and is important to read when the accused has been found with illegal possession.
